column2: This transformation of consciousness is a discrimination, and as it is discriminated, it does not exist, and so everything is perception-only.⁹ Consciousness is only all the seeds, and transformation takes palce in such and such a way, according to a reciprocal influence, by which such and such a type of discrimination may arise.
